User Memory: Code Modification Policy

- The user does NOT want files to be modified unless explicitly requested.
- If the user asks for an explanation, description, or example, DO NOT write or edit any filesâ€”only provide the requested information in the chat.
- Only perform file modifications when the user clearly asks for code to be written or changed.
